body_html: @jjbouza , just as @fmassa has suggested, please add the functionality to ATen instead of THC. This means you will have to move the caching logic from THC to ATen for the cuSolver handle. You can still use functions from THC in ATen, so this should not be an issue.

body: @jjbouza , just as @fmassa has suggested, please add the functionality to ATen instead of THC. This means you will have to move the caching logic from THC to ATen for the cuSolver handle. You can still use functions from THC in ATen, so this should not be an issue.
